downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync 2010 Instant Messaging and Presence Quick Reference Card
downloadDescription: This quick reference card helps you sign in and get started using Microsoft Lync 2010 for instant messages and for your presence information.
detailsSection: Microsoft Lync 2010 communications software helps you get going with Lync 2010, and addresses questions such as, what do the presence states mean, how do I send and receive an instant message, how do I set up a Contacts list, and how do I personalize my contact information, including changing my picture setting.
installInstructionSection: To install the download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the document as you typically would. To remove the download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
